title: Militias Around Baghdad Defend Against Islamic State Militants
teaser: Fears that the militant Sunni group would advance on the capital have receded, but communities close to the city remain nervous and armed. NPR's Arun Rath talks to The Guardian's Ghaith Abdul-Ahad, who was recently embedded with Iraqi Shiite militias around Baghdad.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
